title: Working Student Customer Success - DACH (m/f/d)
content:

We started out in Hamburg back in 2014 but weâ€™re now humbled to call the world our playground, with over 200 employees spread across 25 cities (weâ€™re remote-first), 2000+ international clients and a panel reach of 7 million, globally.

Allow us to introduce ourselves
Hello there! Weâ€™re Appinio, the fastest (and coolest) market research platform. On a mission to make the world a little more fact-based, we help companies understand how consumers think and make better data-driven decisions.
We started out in Hamburg back in 2014 but weâ€™re now humbled to call the world our playground, with over 200 employees spread across 25 cities (weâ€™re remote-first), 2000+ international clients, and a panel reach of 7 million, globally.
Want to be a part of the Appinio movement? ðŸš€
Your mission as a Working Student Customer Success


We are looking for a Working Student Customer Success - DACH (m/f/d) to support our Customer Success Team for Appinio. In this role, you will support our Customer Success Managers, making sure our customers get the insights they need for their business success. You will be at the forefront of our journey to revolutionize the insights market and set the foundation for a career in Customer Success, Account Management or Sales in one of Europeâ€™s fastest-growing companies.

What youâ€™ll be doing


Provide customer support and assist in the coordination of research projects 
Monitor customer activity and health scores, and proactively reach out to identify opportunities for improving their experience and usage of Appinio
Support of the maintenance and administration of our CRM system Hubspot
Preparation of proposals, slides and other material for stakeholder communication
Develop contents and formats to educate and engage with our customers (e.g. webinars, use cases, newsletter, etc.)
Support on operational day-to-day tasks (e.g. planning and organizing monthly meetings)


You will thrive in this role if


You are a student in psychology, business administration or similar fields
You have previous experience in fast-paced, demanding environments like management consulting, big tech, or startups
You are able to break down complex issues
You have an analytical mindset and strong quantitative problem-solving skills 
You show strong verbal and written communication skills in German and English 
Experience with Hubspot or other marketing automation tools is a plus 
You show a high degree of proactiveness, diligence and a get-stuff-done mentality

What's in it for you?

All the hardware you need and your own MacBook
Udemy L&D Platform - full access to 22,000+ courses and certifications to deepen your knowledge as your career progresses





This post not only outlines our ideal candidate but also serves as an inspiration for what this role can evolve into. Even if you consider yourself an 80% fit but have a genuine passion for this position, we encourage you to apply. We're eager to hear from individuals who share our enthusiasm.
Appinio is an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status.








Learn more about us:

 appinio.com    LinkedIn    Xing     Kununu    Instagram
